Constructional types

noteParagraph.text: An initial seal breaking or final sealing movement which is different from the opening or closing movement of the valve is not considered in determining the movement to be classified.

noteParagraph.text: Attention is drawn to Note (1) and the subdivision of sub-class according to which pressure regulators, even with the whole regulating system contained in a valve, operating with or without auxiliary power, are covered by . Details of the valve parts per se are classified in the appropriate groups of sub-class .
